product.name: Beef steak
product.Description: is a flat cut of beef with parallel faces, usually cut perpendicular to the muscle fibers.

product.name: Fried egg
product.Description: a good dish for Breakfast,was cooked my the main chef

product.name: Bun rieu
product.Description: This dish consists of vermicelli (bun tang or vermicelli) and 'crab noodle'. Crab noodle soup is a sour soup made from crab bricks , pounded and filtered crab meat, along with vertical fruits , tomatoes , water fat, vinegar, fish sauce , salt , and scallions

product.name: Taco mexico
product.Description: The tortilla is then folded around the filling and eaten by hand. A taco can be made with a variety of fillings, including beef, pork, chicken, seafood, beans, vegetables, and cheese, allowing for great versatility and variety.

product.name: Cabonara
product.Description: is an Italian pasta dish from Rome made with eggs, hard cheese, cured pork, and black pepper. The dish arrived at its modern form, with its current name, in the middle of the 20th century.
